trans-unit.source: Represents a name and value pair used to correlate messages to specific receiving activities.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于将消息与特定接收活动关联的一个名称和值对。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> classes are defined as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> properties of Workflow Connection Service activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> 类被定义为工作流连接服务活动的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> 属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, these properties are bound to variables declared at the root workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这些属性被绑定到在根工作流活动中声明的变量。

trans-unit.source: For dynamic activities such as <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> each of its children cannot share a universal <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> object.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> 这样的动态活动，其每个子级不能共享通用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Consider the scenario where each task inside a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> has to manage its own conversation.
trans-unit.target: 假设有这么一种情况：<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> 中的每个任务必须管理其自身的会话。

trans-unit.source: The child activities inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> requires a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> instance unique per execution context, or per task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> 中的子活动需要一个对每个执行上下文或每个任务具有唯一性的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> 实例。

trans-unit.source: In order to accomplish this, you have to define a custom activity that has a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> instance property and the Workflow Connection Services activities have to bind to this property.
trans-unit.target: 要实现这一点，您必须定义一个具有 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty> 实例属性的自定义活动，而且工作流连接服务活动必须绑定到此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating a correlation property object, and accessing the Name and Value properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建相关属性对象以及如何访问 Name 和 Value 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property used in the correlation set.
trans-unit.target: 在相关集中使用的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the correlation set property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property used in the correlation set.
trans-unit.target: 获取在相关集中使用的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property used in the correlation set.
trans-unit.target: 在相关集中使用的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the correlation set property.
The value of the correlation set property.
